column5: I am looking for a place to camp and fish in Dunville. I was told to call Grand Island Barbque, they don't have camping anymore and close at 12am. Byng consevation is $30 a day. I heard there is a place in Dunville thats $5 or $10 per person. Any help would be great?  Thank you Daniel
905-701-6874 fishmasters bait and tackle. u can camp there for $25 per nite, rite on the waters edge. 24 hour bait available and a boat launch as well.
I'm sure you'd be able to camp at Port Maitland...  We've stayed there many of times till the wee hours of the morning...
Byng Park, good fishing and they have a pool
